sourcesContent: import { Box, Typography, Container, Divider, IconButton, Tooltip } from '@mui/material'; import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet-async'; import Logo from 'src/components/LogoSign'; import { styled } from '@mui/material/styles'; import FacebookIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Facebook'; import TwitterIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Twitter'; import InstagramIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Instagram'; const MainContent = styled(Box)( () => ` height: 100%; display: flex; flex: 1; overflow: auto; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; justify-content: center; ` ); function StatusMaintenance() { return ( <> Status - Maintenance The site is currently down for maintenance We apologize for any inconveniences caused Phone:{' '} + 00 1 888 555 444 ); } export default StatusMaintenance;
